EditTextPreference.title: API Key
EditTextPreference.dialogMessage: You can found your key in the bunq app (Profile → Security & Settings → Developers → API keys). Please Allow All IP-Addresses for regular synchronization. Zenmoney does not have access to your information and synchronisation runs only locally on your own device.
